properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
There is not a friend
like the Lord sweet Jesus,
No not one, no not one.
No one else could heal
all our soul's diseases,
No not one, no not one.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Jesus knows all about
our struggles,
he will guide till the
day is done.
There's not a friend like
the Lord sweet Jesus,
No not one, no not one.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
There's not an hour
that he is not near us,
No not one, no not one.
No night so dark but his
love can cheer us,
No not one, no not one.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Did ever saint find this friend
forsake him?
No not one, no not one.
Or sinners find that
he would not take him?
No not one, no not one.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Was ever a gift like
the savior given?
no not one, no not one.
Will he refuse us a home
in heaven?
No not one, no not one.
